oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: What the so-called 'Bushman-rice' (i.e. larvae of the ants) does, when the star Altair comes out (L II.-37. 3344-3347). 1) p.3344v: 'Bushman rice' changes into creatures with wings that Lloyd does not know the proper name of, 2) This story is found in Book II-37.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What the 'Bushman rice' does when the ||xo hai stars come out
